doc.field: 1990 to 2000 Census Tract Correspondence and Combined Tracts
1990 to 2000 Census Tract Correspondence and Combined Tracts

This dataset consists of a correspondence table and shape file of the combined 1990 and 2000 Census tracts.
Note: Census tracts from 1990 and 2000 do not match in all areas. This dataset is an attempt to match them. Some combining and splitting of tracts was necessary. See the Lineage in Section 2 of the metadata for more information.

See the Lineage in Section 2 of the metadata for more information.</abstract> <purpose>The correspondence table and subsequent shape file allow for the comparison of 1990 and 2000 Census tract data by designating 1 new 'combined' tract number that accounts for each 1990 and 2000 Census tract.</purpose> <supplinf>Twin Cities 7 County Metropolitan Area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington in Minnesota.</supplinf> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2000</caldate> </sngdate> 8</native> <crossref> <citeinfo> <title>1990 Census Tracts, 2000 Census Tracts, TIGER</title> </citeinfo> </crossref> </idinfo> <dataqual> <attracc> <attraccr>Unknown</attraccr> </attracc> <logic>The dataset is topologically 'clean'.</logic> <complete>Entire seven county geographic area is covered.</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>The positional accuracy of the dataset has not been tested under the National Standards for Spatial Data Accuracy.</horizpar> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr /> </vertacc> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srcscale /> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>1990 and 2000 Census tracts were plotted on a map. In order to compare 1990 with 2000 data, the geographic areas need to be the same. A new 'combined' tract number was created using that map. For tracts that did not change between 1990 and 2000, no change was made in their tract number. Where boundaries differed, one of the following prefixes was added, (6) 2 or more 1990 tracts were merged in to 1 2000 tract; (7) only minor differences between 1990 and 2000, no changes made except to note difference; (8) 2 or more 1990 tracts were combined with 2 or more 2000 tracts; or (9) a 1990 tract was split in to 2 or more 2000 tracts.
Relating the table to the 2000 Census Tract coverage (TIGER/Line file based) on tract00, a dissolve on the combined item created the combined coverage. In AV 3.2, the coverage was converted to a shape file.</procdesc> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>Tract number</indspref> <direct>Vector</direct> <mgmg3obj>Polygon shapes</mgmg3obj> <mgmg3til>One layer for entire seven county region.</mgmg3til> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <geograph> <latres /> <longres /> <geogunit /></geograph> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn /> <mgmg4par /> <otherprj /> </mapproj> <gridsys> <gridsysn>UTM</gridsysn> <utm> <utmzone>15</utmzone> </utm> <spcs> <spcszone /> </spcs> <mgmg4coz /> <mgmg4adj /> </gridsys> <planci> <coordrep> <absres /> <ordres /> </coordrep> <distbrep> <distres /> </distbrep> <plandu>Meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>NAD83</horizdn> <ellips>GRS80</ellips> </geodetic> </horizsys> <vertdef> <altsys> <altdatum /> <altunits /> </altsys> <depthsys> <depthdn /> <depthdu /> </depthsys> </vertdef> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover>Attributes for COMBINED_TRACTS_1990-2000.SHP polygon shape file
AREA: The area of the polygon in square meters
COMBINED: 2000 Combined Tract
Attributes for TRACT_CORRESPONDANCE_1990-2000.DBF Table
STATE: 2 digit FIPS state code
CO: 3 digit FIPS county code
TRACT_1990: 6 digit 1990 tract code
TRACT_2000: 6 digit 2000 tract code
TRACT90: 11 digit FIPS state and county codes, and 1990 tract code
TRACT00: 11 digit FIPS state and county codes, and 2000 tract code
COMBINED: 7 digit combined tract code
PREFIX: 1 digit prefix used for COMBINED code to identify differences between 1990 and 2000 tract codes
NO: unique number scheme identifying all the 1990 and 2000 tracts
Table field definitions in ArcInfo terminology
10 ITEMS: STARTING IN POSITION 1 COL ITEM NAME WDTH OPUT TYP N.DEC ALTERNATE NAME 1 STATE 2 2 I - 3 CO 3 3 C - 6 TRACT_1990 6 6 I - 12 TRACT_2000 6 6 I - 18 TRACT90 11 11 i - 29 TRACT00 11 11 I - 40 COMBINED 7 7 C - 47 PREFIX 1 1 I - 48 DESCRIPTION 10 10 C - 58 NO 3 3 I -</eaover> <eadetcit>None</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Mark Kotz</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Database Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651.602.1644</cntvoice> <cntfax>651.602.1674</cntfax> <cntemail>mark.kotz@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>Census2000TigerCombinedTracts1990_2000</resdesc> <distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).
